name: NSCollectionViewDelegateFlowLayout
desc: A set of methods that a delegate implements to provide layout information to a flow layout object in a collection view.

items.name: func collectionView(NSCollectionView, layout: NSCollectionViewLayout, sizeForItemAt: IndexPath) -> NSSize
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the size of the specified item.

items.name: func collectionView(NSCollectionView, layout: NSCollectionViewLayout, insetForSectionAt: Int) -> NSEdgeInsets
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the margins to apply to content in the specified section.

items.name: func collectionView(NSCollectionView, layout: NSCollectionViewLayout, minimumLineSpacingForSectionAt: Int) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the spacing between successive rows or columns of a section.

items.name: func collectionView(NSCollectionView, layout: NSCollectionViewLayout, minimumInteritemSpacingForSectionAt: Int) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the spacing between successive items of a single row or column.

items.name: func collectionView(NSCollectionView, layout: NSCollectionViewLayout, referenceSizeForHeaderInSection: Int) -> NSSize
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the size of the header view in the specified section.

items.name: func collectionView(NSCollectionView, layout: NSCollectionViewLayout, referenceSizeForFooterInSection: Int) -> NSSize
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the size of the footer view in the specified section.
